subject: ORDER #SSN3870
description_text:
In reference to the above order you will see I ordered the 3 pack of haptic motors.
Today I received the first package that been the haptic motors and it only included 2 motors.
As this is my first order with you I am slightly disappointed that the pedals did not arrive with the same package and the one that did arrive is short a haptic motor.
Regards 
Shaun Singleton

conversations.body_text: Hi shaun singleton,      Our pedals and haptic motors are shipped separately, and the pedals should arrive soon. Please take a photo of the haptic motor and the packaging with the foam, and I will assist you in checking it.

[image0.jpeg][image1.jpeg]

As you can see there is space for the 3rd motor but it has a package with bolts and clips in there.
Regards
Shaun Singleton

Still awaiting your decision.
Regards
Shaun Singleton
